name: Gravity Pick
description:
This is my game for the GeoJam 2022. I build the levels at 2 in the morning, so let us hope that I did not mess up somewhere haha! I still hope that you like this relaxing game and feel free to leave your feedback in the comments, thanks!

Credits:

- https://itch.io/profile/fardifferent (Music)

- Ginskii (Support, Idea)

- Maelvomen (Code, Art, Idea)
